This unit converter is made available to the landman industry and provides the most convenient way to easily convert between measurements commonly found in legacy title instruments, e.g. feet to polls, perches, links, furlongs, etc.
The unit converter works with both length and area.

Also included are fraction to decimal and decimal to fraction converters. And, fraction calculations!

Enjoy, and please sign up for the free trial of LandmanCentral.com, the only software providing automatic, custom title chain flowcharts, multiple types of automatic runsheets, collaboration, billing, and so much more!

Thank you for using the Landman Central Unit Converter.
